description: A story of a scarecrow becoming a soccer star.
title: Field of Dreams
n_1: Sammy the Scarecrow stands on a soccer field, ready to train.
n_2: Sammy impresses with his unexpected soccer talent.
n_3: Sammy displays incredible dribble, weaving through opponents on the field.
n_4: Sammy and Coach Johnson celebrate the achievement.
c1_1: Let's see what I can do!
c2_3: Amazing! You're outstanding in your field!
